SubString

This component returns a substring of the string input [In] from the index specified by the input [In]start with length specified by the input [In]length, when triggered by the input event. If the start index is less than 0 or greater than the length of the string input [In] minus 1 then an empty string is presented to the output [Out].

Ports

  • [In] :

    Data input.

  • [In] start:

    Data input, the index from which to substring the string input [In].

  • [In] length:

    Data input, the length of the substring to create from the string input [In].

  • [Out] :

    Data output.

  • [In] :

    Input event, presents a substring of the string input [In] from the index [In]start of length [In]length, to the output [In] when fired.

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
